reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 429/18: EXTENDING EXEMPTION PERIOD FOR AFFIXING EVIDENCE OF VALIDATION FOR PERMIT
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING EXEMPTION PERIOD FOR AFFIXING EVIDENCE OF VALIDATION FOR PERMIT

content.content: 1. Despite subsection 4 (1) of Regulation 628 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Vehicle Permits) made under the Act, the term of validity of a motor vehicle permit is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit would cease to be currently validated on or after September 1, 2018.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite subsection 4 (1) of Regulation 628 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Vehicle Permits) made under the Act, the term of validity of a motor vehicle permit is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the permit would cease to be currently validated on or after September 1, 2018.

content.content: 2. The 10-day period referred to in subsection 11.1 (2) of Regulation 628 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Vehicle Permits) made under the Act is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire on or after October 3, 2018.
content.raw_html: 2. The 10-day period referred to in subsection 11.1 (2) of Regulation 628 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Vehicle Permits) made under the Act is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire on or after October 3, 2018.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
